content.detailedDescription: My 2 friends and i were walking to my friends house and we looked up saw a flashing light that was yellow blue and green. made a perfect triangle  look kinda like it was above the clouds.. we went to take picture right when we got are phones out to take picture the light flashed twice and the light slowly faded away. after we were scared and went home
content.summary: Flashing light. diferent colors.

content.detailedDescription: Bright light like a spot light very large radiating down 30ish degrees then dimmed out leaving cloud like glow which disapeared no smoke just light. two objects that looked like planes appeared in area and flew out immediately . one se and one north then west. our view was south from north shore li. nassau suffolk border. never saw anything like it very high in the sky. this was not an object it was a circle of light radiating down like an inverted cone. very very bright-- military or et.
content.summary: Bright circle radiating in a 30 degree fan straight down light went out residual light dissipated followed by 2 planes 1 heading ne and one north to west.

content.detailedDescription:
Me,my wife and kid and next door nieghbor were outside. above the trees we noticed a bright light(like a star). then all of a sudden, a bright light shown down like a police helicopter. it lasted about 10 - 15 seconds. we didnt hear any sound and didnt see any object in the sky. the light was brighter on the outer edges and darker in the center, almost like an upside down v.

about 10 minutes later, i noticed what looked like a star moving across the sky from south to north. my wife thought it might be a plane. it was very high and was not blinking and the light stayed consistant the whole time. about 20 minutes after that i saw the same light traveling the same direction. the brightness or the shape of the light did not change as it went across the sky.

we never heard a sound from any of these objects.
content.summary: Cone shaped light.

content.detailedDescription: We were having dinner at norwalk yacht club in norwalk ct.  a bright light in the sky caught my attention and i looked out from under the umbrella thinking that it was the moon.  there was a very bright light with a large oval area of light around us.  almost as though someone were shining a bright flood light on us from up in the sky.  there was no noise of a plane, helicopter or anything else.  after about 20 seconds to one minute the bright center light disapeared and there was just the oval light.  30 seconds later that disapeared too and the sky was left to its crystal clear, stary night.  about 10 people saw this, and all were amazed.  i would love to know what i saw.
content.summary: It looked like a very bright flood light shining down on us from far away. bright light at center with bulb lighting around it. quickly fading.

content.detailedDescription:
We were outside at 7:50pm est and my daughter said "what is that in the sky?"  a cone shaped light was shining down.  it looked like a large spotlight shining down but to high in the sky and too bright to be a helicopter.  we are in rural area.
 
it grew in size and intensity and then the source at the top of the cone went out.  there was a glowing haze that lingered for 15-20 seconds.  

clear and not a cloud in the sky, and no fog in the area. 

it was bizarre and amazing.  i felt like we were seeing something incredible.
content.summary: Burst of cone shaped light with afterglow.

content.detailedDescription: The light was a small light with a broad beam with a mist in the light. the light stayed about a minute then just kind of faded. the misty light lingered after the main light disapeared. i have seen ufo's before but this was nothing like i have ever seen. this is a populated area. i was on my deck and it is a very clear night. i thought it might be a helecopter at first,but no way. i was stuned at what i was seeimg and a little freaked out. i tried to go get my wife but i did not have enough time. i will be thinking about this for some time.
content.summary: Broad beam of light out of sky with a light mist in the light.

content.detailedDescription:
The first time we saw one of these chrome balls it was in 2006 about 4pm in dubois pa. it was being escourted by two fight jets one in front and one in back of it as they flew through the sky heading north. the second time was in august 2008 about 3 miles from my house. we were coming home from a day of 4 wheeling and as we came to the end of a dirt road , it was just sitting in the sky , plain as day looking like the chrome balls on the movie phantasim. no sound , no smoke. as we watched it , it seemed to just fade into the sky like a mirage. at first it was bold , vivid, very shiny looking and then it just started fading out till it was gone . 
the reason i am telling you now is because i watched the ufo's ove earth about the bucks county incidents and i realized i saw the same ball they described.
it could be something military though i never saw anything like it but i know the fighter jets the first one we saw .
just thought you'd like to know .
sincerely robin dixon
p.S. i am a great fan and a true believer we are not alone.
content.summary: We saw it hovering in the sky not making a sound . it was high enough to look the size of a softball

content.detailedDescription: As my husband and i were driving out of the cajun snack bar we noticed a bright, white light in the sky ahead of us.  it was so bright there was no missing it.  we stopped the car in the parking lot and watched the light.  it was staionary and looked as if the light was shining down through a fog.  neither of us knew what to think or had any idea what it was.  as it was projecting down it suddenly went dark but the fog underneath continued to glow several seconds after the light went out.  the sky was clear and there was no fog or clouds in the sky.  we looked for it again all the way home but didn't see it again.  i immediately started searching the internet when i got home and noticed that people in connecticut, virginia and new york seemed to be seeing the same thing we just saw.
content.summary: Very bright white light shining down through a fog.  the fog continued to glow after light went out.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting outside at night with several neighbors and friends looked up to see unbelievably large triangle shape light in the sky.  called all adults over to look as i was in shock to see it.  three of our children were close by and also saw the same exact thing and came running to tell us.  it dissappeared.  called the local police and news station to report.  we all drew pictures to have it fresh in our minds.  the object was nothing definable as far as a plane , comet or satelite.  the area lit up was too large to describe.  the light was stationary while we were observing it. we all drew pictures to preserve our impressions.  cloudless sky but the illumination looked like glowing clouds.  four adults and three teenagers saw the exact same thing.
content.summary: Triangle shape light in sky lit from beam above  huge

content.detailedDescription: Me and my husband were outside tonight and a cone shaped form appeared it shone a bright light down from it. the sides of the v were bright and defined. it stayed in the sky for about 10 seconds and started to fade to a smokey cloud which stayed in the sky for about 10 more seconds. we  both said to each other what is it.
content.summary: Defined upside down cone shape-with a bright light shining down from it.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my yard with friends and looked up at the clear night sky. there were no clouds. i saw something and mentioned it. we all looked up. before us was an unexplainable sight. there was an intense bright light high in the sky. it was very high and very bright. beneath this light was a cone shape of light, as if it was a flashlight pointing from space. there was a fog or a smoke being illuminated by this light. the bright light disappeared. then the smoke slowly dissipated, leaving no trace. within 30 seconds all that was left was the clear night sky.
content.summary: Bright light in the sky, emanating an intense cone shaped light and trailing smoke or fog

content.detailedDescription: I was  at the stop sign and happened to look up into the sky. i noticed this bright light and it had this large beam of light  coming from it downwards. the light didn't move it was completely still. i pulled off the road as there was a truck behind me. the truck went to pull out then i noticed that it stop and we both saw this thing. it lasted about one min to two mins. it didn't move. the beam of light just went down so far. i know it wasn't a plane or helicopter. it was the strangest thing i have ever  saw.I even followed the truck after it pulled out and asked them if they just saw what i did and they said yes! they had no idea what it was but thought it was just as strange as i did and i told them i'm glad someone else saw it because i kept repeating to myself that i'm losing it.......... it happened in nova scotia, cape sable island -south side at approx. 9pm
content.summary: Bright light with beam of like coming from it.

content.detailedDescription: Myself and kids from the school and another staff member were fishing at the lake at timberidge school when someone shouted hey look at that we looked up and saw a ball with a light that shown down on the earth for about ten seconds and then disapeared.
content.summary: It flashed a light down on the earth for about ten seconds

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside the firehouse talking with the guys. we looked up and saw this light that looked like it was shining down like a large flashlight. way to high to be a helicopter or plane. it satied in place but kinda moved back and forth. then some clouds or smoke started to cover the light. the "smoke" became thicker until the light disappeared. there were no othert clouds in the sky. we tried to debug this but could not. this was seen by 5 firefighters.
content.summary: A light shaped like cone

content.detailedDescription: Saw a small dot in the sky about 45 degrees south west in the sky for about about a minute.  it was very bright in the begining but began fading slowly until it was gone.  the size of the light projection in front of it was what made it so anomolous, it was maybe 15 times the size of a full moon.  it looked like it was going north.
content.summary: Light in sky with very large triangular light projection in front of it

content.detailedDescription: hello i would like someone to contact me about this due to the fact that im still so astonished that this just happened. the event literally happened about 30 minutes ago so i have a clear and vivid picture in my head. my mother and i were outside when we saw a light in the sky with a trail at the end. this object was in earths atmosphere. the trail turned into a beam of light which got sucked into this stationary star and then in the blink of an eye the entire beam of light got sucked into the ufo and it dissapeared. there were no flashing lights. i hope this information can help.
content.summary: Star like with huge light trail which got sucked back into it and then vanished. almost as if it was projecting a beam.

content.detailedDescription: a group of people at a barbecue saw a distant blue light in the southwest sky.  the light source went away but a light beam remained. light remained in place in the sky for about 30 seconds.  then the light source turned away and all we
content.summary: Cone shaped blue light clear sky spotlight.

content.detailedDescription:
Eight of us were on a dock at our marina and one spotted the object in the sky. the object was a bright white lit trapezoid shape shorter on the top. it was stationary in the sky. below the object was a fog like substance which was illuminated by the white light. the object did not move nor did the fog seem to be moving away as if it was a rocket. there was no sound from that direction. the sky was star lit with no moon and there was no ground fog or clouds. the light suddenly stopped but the fog seemed to be glowing white for a while after. there was no wind and still no sound. 
none of us had ever seen anything like it before. it was not like a fireworks display but more like someone standing on a 1 mile high ladder with a bright white flash light shinning it down on a small patch of fog.
there is no reason for this type of light in the sky because there is really nothing in the direction we were looking.
content.summary: Appeared stationary in sky bright white with trailing fog

content.detailedDescription: I went outside the main inn(castle hill inn & resort) to speak with the valets and noticed a bright light in the sky giving off a triangular shape of white light. the ball of light just vanished and the remaining trangular shape of light slowly faded away. it was the most amazing thing i have ever seen in my life!
content.summary: Looked like someone shining a flash light down from space

content.detailedDescription: I went outside on my deck. i was looking in the eastern sky at about 45degrees. it had just recently become dusk and there could have been no sun reflection. i then saw a white cloud shaped like a long length wise trapezoid. i was looking at it for a about 15 seconds until it disappeared completely. it was very bright, almost like a thrust cloud from something going straight up. it was large in the sky, but not too high in the atmosphere. i immediately got my friend out to look at it as it was disappearing. i could not see any objects moving or otherwise around the cloud like thing. it was the strangest thing i have ever seen in the sky.
content.summary: Trapezoidal shaped white cloud

content.detailedDescription: While walking to my front door from my car, i noticed a single red point of light moving across the sky. the object looked similar to how jupiter looks on a clear night only much more red in colour. i at first thought it was a plane but as i watched it with my sister we quickly realised that it was not. i then thought maybe a satellite but having seen many of these before as an avid stargazer i decided i couldnt be. as we continued to watch the object slowly move across the sky, it gradually dimmed in brightness and vanished. we then waited to see if the bright light would return only to realise that 3 more red lights were moving across the sky in different directions! as we watched them move at the same slow speed as the previous one, these to gradually dimmed and vanished. i recalled while watching that i had read a story in the news a few months earlier, that a similer sighting had been recorded in which people were told that the phenomenon could be put down to paper lanterns. the lanterns had apparently been released close by from a party. the lights my sister and i observed were not paper lanterns! they were way to bright and moving much to quickly to be lanterns.
content.summary: Four bright red star like objects moving across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
We (myself and my cousin) noticed lights outside my window, up in the sky.
i looked at them and studied them:they were bright white circles standing
in a vertical formation.About 5 of them.When i looked closer these lights
were moving in circular motions while remaining in a vertical line.

we were on our way to bed and my cousin said"whats with all the lights?"
she ignored them but i watched for about 5 mins.I wasnt sure what to make of it so i dismissed it and went into bed.While i was in bed i began
thinking about the lights and a cloud of light sleepy air took over my mind and then i went to sleep.
content.summary: We saw a row of lights outside my window( in the sky)

content.detailedDescription:
It was sept 15, 2009 at 12:30 am when i came out on my balcony for a smoke and noticed a bright white light to the north north east probably about 5 miles or so away. raalizing it was out of the ordinary i went inside to get my cell phone to take a picture. when i took the 1st picture it dimmed a little. i then went to take the 2nd picture and it zoomed off to the east and went out of sight. i live near the municipal airport but have never seen an airplane or helicopter like this or do what this one did. i did not see any blinking colored lights like i normally see on aircraft. i told a friend at work and he suggested i report this to mufon. i was unable to download the pics from my phone but will have them later if needed.
thank you.
content.summary: Bright star like light to the north stationarly several min then took off to the east.

content.detailedDescription: I would  like to  send  the  video  to  james carrion ..The evidence is clear vivid  i want him to see this for himself ..Please call or email telling where to send video so he can see and examine for himself.
content.summary: Making video of grandson came out the sky was hovering lazaer lights flashing captured image on video

content.detailedDescription: I was personally attacked by two "ufos" in the very early morning hours of november 25, 2006, just a few days after i had sent an email to british authorities (london's university college hospital, where litvinenko was being treated and later died) on the afternoon of november 23, informing that alexander litvinenko was poisoned with polonium. the panicked polonium culprits decided to attempt retaliatory action while i was asleep: i was awoken by a disturbing sensation in my head, somewhat like abnormal pressurization being applied to the brain. when i opened my eyes in the dark room (it was still night), all my surroundings including the sky visible through the uncovered windows appeared neon yellow. i shut my eyes hard to shake off the illusion, but when i opened them again i saw the same effect. this moved me to mentally counteract the sensation, and the false-color vision gradually faded until i could see normally. at that moment i saw two blinking points of light that did not resemble aircraft beacons in both color (electric blue-white) and manner of flashing (led-like). it was apparent that they were two separate bodies, but they were moving in slow and perfect unison, one trailing the other no more than a few hundred feet apart, and both blinking at identical but not simultaneous intervals. radar archives will show that no civilian or other conventional aircraft were in that location and at that time (around 3am probably over bethesda, md, less than five miles from my location at perhaps 1 or 2 miles altitude), on that flight course (curving from southwest to west and then northwest).
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufos retaliate against silver spring, md, man for polonium alert

content.detailedDescription:
Urgent!  find someone who had recorded this game.  just prior to kickoff there is a shot of the sky over the endzone.  you will see a dark object which appears to be slowly moving away from the camera as it turns left and right very slowly.  then very suddenly the object will shoot in the other direction and out of the field of view.  viewed in slow motion you can see that the object is acually moving and does not just disappear from the screen... it accelerates at tremendous speed.

i belive my copy of this will be lost because i was not recording it.  i am able to rewind my digital broadcast, but i am afraid i will lose it.  i will however, try to save it by hitting the record button and hope that it will capture what was there from the beginning.

if you can find someone who has recorded the game from just before the kickoff you will see it for sure.

feel free to contact me to see if i was able to capture this with my dvr.
content.summary: Seen on cbs tv broadcast of florida/tennessee football game.

content.detailedDescription: My kids woke my husband and i up around 2:30am. we have a large window in our bedroom and happend to look out. we seen 8 bright flying objects in the sky. these were not planes or stars. they hovered around for hours. i was able to catch them on video. three of them were lined up and pulsating. one on the side of it was an orange color of light, and the others were bright and white like star looking. i went back to sleep for awhile and around 5am woke up and caught to ufo still hovering in the sky these were so bright and white. this all took place in livermore california on september 19,2009. this isnt the first time, this happend on august 14, 2009. i have a feeling we will have another good view tonight.
content.summary: 8 ufo over livermore

content.detailedDescription: I went out of my house with 3 people, 4 including myself to smoke a cig around the time of 3 am. we went to this feild right by my house less then 50 feet away where we normally come to smoke our cigs. one of our friends pointed into the sky at this circle shapped object in the distance right above the tree line and it was flashing blue, red, and white. we all looked at it an agreed that it was a plane, but we then realized that this thing wasn't moving at all. we all looked at this thing for probably 10 mins. and during that time not any movement at all just staying still which we all thought was weird. then when we all were gonna had back to my hosue this thing starts moving up and down at some pretty incrediable rates of speed. it went up and down and left to right. once we saw this we all were stunned. i live right next to an airport and i have never seen anythng like this that could move the way this object was moving. as we all watched this thing got higher in the sky but now it was moving a little more slow. we watched for about an hour and went back into my house. around 430 am when it was time for another cig we come out and see the same thing in the sky excepte this time much brighter and it had a small ball at the bottom of it blinking blue, red, and white. this thing was massive im talking big at least a football feild this thing just didnt move just stayed in the sky. at this point we called our friends which got up and looked out the window and saw the same thing about 6 or 7 miles down the road. i woke up my mom and see saw the object to and see said first thing to me that its not a plane. while we were watching this we could pick out the planes in the sky at the time. at least 3 planes were in the sky and those pilots had to of seen this in the sky it was impossable to miss brighter then the stars and head turning that simple head turning. we watched intil the sun started to come up and this thing moved up in the sky and disappared so quickly. what ever we saw was indefinitly not a plane or any plane i have ever seen, this thing i saw was unbelievable.
content.summary: Huge object in the sky with flashing lights and speed

content.detailedDescription:
We were on our rooftop deck for lunch - we noticed an egg-shaped white object moving directly vertical in the sky.  it seemed to slightly wave back and forth, but it was not a balloon.  it then moved in a straight line east-ward, and after about five minutes, moved straight up again.  we took a picture of it, and upon magnification it seems to be divided into three sections.  (see attached image)

we were in downtown toronto (leslieville area), on canada, on saturday, sept 19, 2009 at approximately 2:00pm.  we saw the object for approx 10 minutes in total.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: White (or metallic) egg-like shape in sky, with possibly 3 sections, moving up, then east, then up again

content.detailedDescription:
Around 11 pm (i didn't think to check the exact time) on sept. 18th, 2009, i saw what at first appeared to be an airliner (we are in the mccarren fight path for planes that have taken off from mccarren airport going east bound), it had 5 rectangle white lights from left to right in a straight line with a white strobe flashing on the bottom center. what made me pay attention was there was no sound from the jets (at that time of night you can hear the jet engines for a very long time) and it wasn't moving away like a airliner, it was stationary. i watched the lights for like 30 to 45 seconds and then it just disappeared. i mean disappeared, poof, it was just gone. it wasn't like it went into a cloud, it just vanished, like faster than a blink of the eye and i didn't see it again. i had the strangest feeling that i saw something that i wasn't ment to see. 

the lights i saw were east of las vegas near nellis air force base, over what we call sunrise mountain (real name is frenchman mountain), kind of low in the sky, maybe a 45 degrees from the horizon. a plane at that degree would have been very high and far away and just a dot. this looked to be only about 10 miles away.

i was just wondering if anyone else saw the same thing and reported this sighting? 

this isn't the first weird sighting i've seen, i've reported to mufon before a few years ago. of course area 51 isn't that far away. 

another weird light i saw was few months ago at night, i didn't record the date and time, sorry, i saw what looked to be a star but it was moving slowly in the sky. if you had just looked upward in the night sky you would have thought it was just another star, but i was gazing at the stars and saw it moving, then a very bright light came off of it for about 3 seconds, like it was taking a night time photo, then it went back to being a slow moving star then it disappeared. i watched this for about 30 seconds. this was moving from north to south, was in the eastern sky, around 60 degrees (guessing) from the horzon.

anyway, let me know if anyone else saw these latest lights too so that i know i'm not seeing things.
alan brunson
content.summary: Lights seen and then disappearing
